original_text: So the disciples picked up all the pieces. They filled 12 baskets with the bits of bread that the people had not eaten.
korean_text: 이에 거두니 보리떡 다섯 개로 먹고 남은 조각이 열두 바구니에 찼더라

sentences.original_text: So the disciples picked up all the pieces.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 제자들은 남은 조각들을 모두 거두었습니다.

sentences.original_text: that the people had not eaten.
